name: Filesystem
description: Secure file operations with configurable access controls. Read, write, move, search, and manage files and directories with sandboxed permissions. The official reference implementation from the MCP team.
author: Anthropic

name: Fetch
description: Web content fetching and conversion for efficient LLM usage. Retrieves URLs and converts HTML to markdown, making web content digestible for AI agents without browser automation overhead.
author: Anthropic

name: Git
description: Tools to read, search, and manipulate Git repositories. Supports diffing, logging, branching, committing, and searching through repository history — all through MCP tool calls.
author: Anthropic

name: Memory
description: Knowledge graph-based persistent memory system. Stores entities, relations, and observations in a local graph that persists across sessions. Lets agents remember context, facts, and relationships long-term.
author: Anthropic

name: Brave Search
description: Web and local search using Brave's Search API. Perform web searches, get local business info, and retrieve search results — all from within your agent's MCP tool calls. The official Brave-maintained server.
author: Brave

name: Sequential Thinking
description: Dynamic and reflective problem-solving through thought sequences. Enables agents to break complex problems into sequential reasoning steps, revise earlier thoughts, and branch into alternative paths. Great for planning and analysis tasks.
author: Anthropic

name: GitHub
description: Repository management, file operations, and full GitHub API integration. Create repos, manage issues and PRs, search code, push commits, and manage branches — everything you need for GitHub workflows via MCP.
author: Anthropic

name: Slack
description: Channel management and messaging capabilities for Slack workspaces. List channels, read messages, post replies, search conversations, and manage threads. Now community-maintained by Zencoder.
author: Zencoder

name: PostgreSQL
description: Read-only database access with schema inspection capabilities. Query PostgreSQL databases, explore table schemas, list tables, and run analytical queries — with read-only safety by default.
author: Anthropic

name: Puppeteer
description: Browser automation and web scraping via headless Chrome. Navigate pages, take screenshots, click elements, fill forms, and extract content. Gives agents full browser control for complex web interactions.
author: Anthropic
